message: Let's split it fairly, I'll give you a good deal!
Let's be fair and split it evenly. No need for complications!
You said be fair, but I think I deserve a bit more!
I'm willing to give you a little more, but I still think we should aim for a relatively equal split.  Time is ticking!
I'm not getting any younger, I need a bigger share!
I'm starting to think this is going to be a long negotiation.  I'm willing to increase my share a bit, but I need to get a good deal for myself as well.  Let's make progress!
Time's running out, I'm not going to get a better deal than this!
We're nearing the end, and I think we need to be realistic.  I'm offering a good deal, but if we don't agree, we risk losing everything!
This is my last offer, take it or leave it!
We're down to the wire!  This is my final offer.  It's a good deal for both of us, or we risk getting nothing at all.
